tuv.seg: Direct elections to the European Parliament take place every 5 years throughout the European Union
Reáchtáiltear toghcháin dhíreacha do Pharlaimint na hEorpa gach 5 bliana ar fud an Aontais Eorpaigh
Voting procedure in a European election
An Córas Vótála do Thoghchán Eorpach
Explanation of the system of voting in an election to the European Parliament
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar an gcóras vótála atá i bhfeidhm le toghchán le Pharlaimint na hEorpa
Eligibility for Membership of the European Parliament
Intofa mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa
To be eligible for membership of the European Parliament, you must fulfil certain criteria
Le bheith intofa mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa, caithfidh tú critéir áirithe a shásamh
Find out whether you might be eligible and why some people are disqualified
Faigh amach más féidir leat bheith cáilithe agus cén fáth nach gcáilíonn daoine áirithe
Nomination of Candidates for election to the European Parliament
Iarrthóirí a ainmniú do bhallraíocht i bParlaimint na hEorpa
How to nominate someone else or be nominated for election to the European Parliament
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar chonas ainmniúchán a fháil mar iarrthóir i dtoghchán Pharlaimint na hEorpa
Replacement Candidates for the European Parliament
Ath-Iarrthóirí do Pharlaimint na hEorpa
If a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) resigns or dies, their vacancy is filled from a replacement list of eligible candidates
Má chailltear Feisire Eorpach nó má éiríonn sé/sí as oifig, líontar an folúntas ó liosta ionaid iarrthóirí incháilithe
European elections - counting the votes
Toghcháin Eorpacha- na vótaí a chomhaireamh
How your vote is counted in an election to the European Parliament
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar an gcóras le vótaí a chomhaireamh i dtoghchán do Pharlaimint na hEorpa
European elections - alternative voting arrangements
Toghcháin Eorpacha - socruithe eile vótála
Alternative voting arrangements that are place to facilitate elections to the European Parliament
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na socruithe eile vótála atá i bhfeidhm do thoghcháin Pharlaimint na hEorpa

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
Fundamental Rights under the Irish Constitution
Bunchearta faoi Bhunreacht na hÉireann
